name: iot-ui5-errorhandler
description: Handle UI5- and OData-messages and display them in MessagePopover/-Box

scripts.build-for-deploy: npm run build && npm run flatten && npm run clean-after-flatten
scripts.flatten: cp -r dist/resources/errorhandler/* dist && cp dist/resources/errorhandler/.library dist && cp dist/resources/.Ui5RepositoryTextFiles dist
